author: joyce
msg: Resolves CLIMATE-42 - Add sliders for selecting grid steps
- Adds two sliders for selecting the lat/lon grid steps. The sliders are
hidden/shown depending on whether the user has specified a dataset as
the regrid base. The current way this is handled is a bit messy. I
think thi should be moved over to a directive eventually to help clean
everything up.

author: joyce
msg: Resolves CLIMATE-64 - User is unable to uncheck regrid box.
- Changes the logic for ensuring that only one regrid checkbox is
selected to ensure that the user can deselect a checkbox witout having
to select a different dataset's checkbox.

author: joyce
msg: Resolves CLIMATE-63 - Adds jQuery UI

author: joyce
msg: Resolves CLIMATE-41 - Add re-gridding logic to DatasetDisplayCtrl.
- Adds an ng-click attribute to the "Regrid Base" checkbox that calls
the "setRegridBase" function in the DatasetDisplayCtrl. The index of
the dataset is used to ensure that only one checkbox is ticked.

author: joyce
msg: Resolves CLIMATE-62 - Add checkbox for selecting regrid options.
- Adds a checkbox to each dataset's display area so the user can select
which dataset they want to use for regridding. Currently there's no
logic coded in to their functionality. More work will be done later so
the user can only select a single (or no) datasets.
